summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2217 for the improvement of West Sixty-fifth Street, from Thirty-second Avenue Northwest to Thirty-sixth Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains therein of proper dimensions and material, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire-hydrants and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district; under Ordinance No. 22483, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
